title: unphucking believable, your server gives me 5k ping from the get go. youtube ff14 on ps4 works fine
body: and i get leave buster? you have got to be fking joking. and on top of that an easy win becomes an auto loss get.

replies.body: Lets blame riot for ping and list irrelevant things that work, that'll show 'em

Many people are having some sort of d/c problem atm.

Not sure if it's the server dying again or our reliable ISPs are taking a hiccup.
